name: CL_LNK_ORDERS
description: The CL_LNK_ORDERS table contains the noadd information about the linked group.

columns.name: LNK_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the linked order group record.

columns.name: PAT_CSN
columns.description: This item stores the contact serial number (CSN) of the patient visit associated with this linked order group record.

columns.name: LINK_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description: This is the link type of the linked order group.
